home.title: Hello World!
home.body:
Welcome to the official page of Nishant Verma, here you can get all the information about me, use above menu to get details of a particular domain and if you are looking for a summary then you can check out my resume.

Regards,
Nishant Verma

profile.name: Nishant Verma
profile.vision: FOSS enthusiast, Just show me the code, love to attend hackathons and startup weekends, Fan of GNU/Linux, UI/UX and good Engineering, Also a visionary.

Adds free downloads are available for Premium Access Only.Min download speed for any of our content is 7.2 mbps with 4G.We guarantee you a class in our service, feel thankful to give feedback.All download links are resumable and links will never expire.We thank you for being a part of us.

work.name: personal-home-page
work.about: A website isn’t static; it’s dynamic. It’s ever-changing. The moment you accomplish something, you can add it to your website. When you complete a project, you can put it in your portfolio for all to see. You don’t need to print new copies of it and send it out to your contacts over and over; you just update it. People can continually come back and see what you’re up to.

projects.title: CLUB1o1 APP
projects.about: Develop an app for college society CLUB1O1 • The idea behind CLUB 1O1 is to have seminars /competitions/vivid technical events in a competitive environment to enhance the views and knowledge of the students. • The wide spectrum of members will be committed to the advancement of theory and practice of Computer Engineering and Technology Systems, Science and Engineering related Arts and Sciences.

projects.title: Spero
projects.about: Spero is an open source decentralized job marketplace for refugees, asylums, NGOs and governments. we leverage blockchain and artificial intelligence to connected about 65.6 million refugees to jobs around the world. This project was created in December 2017 for the biggest Global Virtual GovHack hackathon organized by UAE Government in 2017.

projects.name: Genetic-Tetris-Ai
projects.about:
An implementation of Genetic Algorithms to create evolving/mutating AI to play Tetris. Genetic Algorithms follow the principles first laid down by Charles Darwin of 'survival of the fittest.'
  • It uses matrix to create the game of Tetris.
  • Multiple speeds and ranking system for gameplay.
  • Simple yet beautiful UI / UX with user driven actions.

projects.title: Celer
projects.about:
Celer helps businesses to distribute their processing across the devices connected to the Internet.
  • Web app to get the processing from business users and API for app developers to integrate in there app.
  • API use 20 % -30 % of total available processing power.
  • Web app for app developers to see the processing they provided from there user base and get compensated for it(They are asked to remove ads or make there app freemium if they earn above a certain limit from us.)

projects.name: DataStructures-CPP
projects.about:
DataStructures-CPP is an application to implement data structures and algorithms in C++ using a menu-driven interface.
  • Created Source file for all the popular data structures.
  • Neat application structure for beginners and professionals to understand.
  • The program can be easily converted into other programming languages.

projects.name: Alexandrite
projects.about:
Alexandrite is an android app, which saves data on a device, whether it's temporary files, downloaded app assets, user media, structured data, or something else .
  • Worked on data storage provided by a device on Android.
  • Automated multiple processes.
  • Beautiful UI / UX with a smooth design.

projects.title: Optimus
projects.about:
Optimus helps businesses visualise their data and get better insights into the factors which are driving sales.
  • Platform to collect data from all over the world to process in real time.
  • Focused on key factors like when to advertise more, which brand need more focused or which item to produce more and when.
  • Great visualization tools for all the data.

achievements.title: Google India Challenge Scholarship Recipient - 2018
achievements.about: Recipient of Google India Challenge Scholarship for the Android Developer track.

achievements.title: 2nd | International Robotic Competition (IRC)
achievements.location: Husky Union Building, University of Washington, Seattle, USA
achievements.about:
My team `Real Steel` designed a rocket assembly process for IRC International 2014 held at Seattle, USA in 2015.
  • Robot aim was to assemble a rocket.
  • Created a black line follower robot which could remove obstacles.
  • The robot picked objects to place them at a launchpad.
